metadata.title: CVE-2024-26967 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: clk:qcom: camcc-sc8280xp: fix terminating of frequency table arrays Thefrequency table arrays are supposed to be terminated with an empty element.Add such entry to the end of the arrays where it is missing in order toavoid possible out-of-bound access when the table is traversed by functionslike qcom_find_freq() or qcom_find_freq_floor(). Only compile tested.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
